edu.uka.aifb.wikipedia.api
Interface IWikipediaDatabase

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLWikipediaDatabase
public interface IWikipediaDatabase

Interface for a general wikipedia api.

Author:
pso

getLinkedPagesFromCandidates

java.util.Collection<IPage> getLinkedPagesFromCandidates(IPage p,
                                                         java.util.List<IPage> pages)
Starting from a source page and a list of ids, get all pages with an id from the list that are linked from the source page.

Parameters:
p - Source page.
ids - List of ids from pages that are searched.
Returns:
Collection of pages from the candidates that are linked from the source page.

getAllArticleIds

gnu.trove.TIntArrayList getAllArticleIds()
Get an array containing all article ids in this Wikipedia database. Articles are pages in the default namespace, that are no redirect pages.

Returns:
An array containing all article ids.

getArticleIds

gnu.trove.TIntArrayList getArticleIds(int number)
Get an array containing the specified number of article ids in this Wikipedia database. Articles are pages in the default namespace, that are no redirect pages.

Parameters:
number - The number of articles. Set to <=0 for all articles.
Returns:
An array containing the article ids.

readArticleIds

gnu.trove.TIntArrayList readArticleIds(java.lang.String table,
                                       java.lang.String column)
Get an array containing all ids read from a specified table and column.

Parameters:
targetLanguages - A list of languages.
Returns:
An array containing the article ids.
